extendedInfo.description: Nintaii is an award winning, brain twisting puzzle game of rolling blocks and switches!  Roll the block through the twisting maze dropping it into the destination.  The Japanese term ânintaiiâ means âpatience, perseverance, or endurance.â  Can you use your patience to make it through all 100 levels?

reviews.title: Fantastic but wont start
reviews.comment: Used to have this fantastic game on blackberry. When I got android I bought it for galaxy s3. I loved the style and the puzzles, but it wont start at all. It just says it has stopped working :( if next update it starts, I will gladly change to the 5 stars it deserves
reviews.author: Thomas G.

reviews.title: Doesn\'t run on my Nexus 7.
reviews.comment: This has never run on my nexus 7. No response to emails. I just tried it on my Nexus 4 and, sure enough, it doesn\'t run. Again, no response from developer. We need refunds for this scam purchase.
reviews.author: Camille Khoury

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work with the htc rezound
reviews.comment: Awesome game,but doesn\'t work on my new htc rezound.  Don\'t buy if you have a rezound.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t start
reviews.comment: Won\'t start on HTC one. Bummer because I liked this game....
reviews.author: Shon Olson

reviews.title: A REAL CHALLENGE!
reviews.comment: Finally, a playable and amusing game in this category supporting 960*540 screen resolution too :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: EXCELLENT
reviews.comment: Really a fun game to play.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can definitely be tricky
reviews.comment: Don\'t one star an app because it doesn\'t run on your particular device.  Send a message to the author. That said, this is a highly enjoyable puzzle game that makes you plan ahead.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work for note 2
reviews.comment: Good puzzle game, but please fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: An interesting little brain-teaser
reviews.comment: My wife and I both love this game, though she\'s torn through it far faster than myself. It would he nice to show a special game completion screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One of my favorites
reviews.comment: But doesnt work on newer phones.. it was my most played game on my g2, but wont even start on my new note 2 :(
reviews.author: Lauro Kreismann

reviews.title: Wish it worked.
reviews.comment: Had this game on my Kindle. Amazon version. Worked fine and I enjoyed it. This one from Google play won\'t even open. Tried the free version & pay version. Nada.
reviews.author: Norm Thabit

reviews.title: Broken like the rest
reviews.comment: Installed on my Note 2 fine when I got it a couple months ago. The last update borked it for me. Help?
reviews.author: Tonny Be

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: This game is one awsome time waster!     Makes one think ahead.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: This game is great, but it doesn\'t run. I try to open it and it crashes...
reviews.author: Sean Knox

reviews.title: persistant crash on Xperia S
reviews.comment: cant play anymore
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SUCKS BIG TIME
reviews.comment: Used to be fun but now it just sucks. Doesn\'t run on new hardware (nexus 7, galaxy note 2) developer sucks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t open on Galaxy Note II
reviews.comment: After downloading and attempting open, game crashes and force closes before even getting to play.
reviews.author: Gregory Rodgers

reviews.title: Nintaii
reviews.comment: Very,very good. Takes a bit of time to get used to but very enjoyable. Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on GSIII
reviews.comment: Fix this, please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome time killer game
reviews.comment: Had this game on bb and still great
